page.title: 05EVENTS IN THE AREA
page.content: HAPPENINGS IN THE AREA by KAREN KENINGALE THERE ARE QUITE A LOT OF HAPPENINGS IN THE AREA.THERE ARE BROWNIES,GUIDES, CUBS AND SCOUTS.THEY MAKE MONEY BY HAVING FETES AND SHOWS.IN THE VILLAGE THERE ARE CHUCH AND CHAPEL SERVICES. THEY HAVE WEDDINGS,CHRISTENINGS AND BERIAL SERVICES.THERE IS A FIRE STATION.EVERY AUGUST THERE IS A VILLAGE CARNIVAL.THERE ARE TWO SCHOOLS IN THE VILLAGES.A PRIMARY SCHOOL AND A SECONDRY SCHOOL CALLED JOHN BIRKBECK. THERE IS A POLICE HOUSE IN THE VILLAGE AND THE POLICE MAN AND HE PATROLS THE SURROUNDING VILLAGES.THERE IS A HOLIDAY CAMP CALLED THE LAKE SIDE LIDO ,IT HAS A FISHING AND BOATING LAKE,AMUSMENTS AND SWIMMING AND OTHER THINGS.
